name: e-banking-3.0
description: E-Banking 3.0 - Modern microservices architecture with Nx monorepo, Spring Boot, GraphQL, and Kafka

scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && npm run dev:backend
scripts.dev:backend: nx run-many -t serve -p service-discovery graphql-gateway auth-service user-service account-service --parallel=5
scripts.docker:infra:up: docker compose up -d postgres kafka keycloak --build
scripts.docker:infra:down: docker compose down postgres kafka keycloak

author: E-Banking Team
